DOC.brief_summary: This efficacy safety study evaluate LUMIGAN® .01 ( bimatoprost 0.01 % ) alone compare TRAVATAN Z® ( travoprost 0.004 % ) TIMOLOL GFS , 0.5 % ( timolol 0.5 % ophthalmic gel form solution ) patient require IOP lower therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Bimatoprost 0.01 % Alone Compared With Travoprost 0.004 % Timolol 0.5 % Subjects With Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Ocular hypertension glaucoma require treatment medication Have best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) 20/100 good eye History LASIK , LASEK , RK , and/or PRK study eye ( ) History intraocular surgery glaucoma laser surgery study eye ( ) within 3 month Use topical , periorbital , intravitreal systemic steroid within 3 month expect use course study
